channel.title: code injection on 10degres
channel.description: Recent content in code injection on 10degres

item.title: Code injection in SimpleJobScript by Niteosoft
item.description: The installer of SimpleJobScript is vulnerable to Remote Command Execution if not completed yet through the parameter url.

item.title: Code injection in Zenphoto v1.5.6 and prior
item.description: A PHP code injection vulnerability in /zp-core/setup/index.php of Zenphoto 1.5.6 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code.
